Class HorizontalOffsetMetalSliderUI

java.lang.Object

      javax.swing.plaf.SliderUI
          javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicSliderUI
              javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalSliderUI
                  edu.umaryland.igs.idea.HorizontalOffsetMetalSliderUI

 class HorizontalOffsetMetalSliderUI
extends MetalSliderUI

HorizontalOffsetMetalSliderUI is a custom UI for the "Number of bins" slider that paints major tick marks at the locations of its custom labels.
